title: Cleaver, 16th century
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Large blade with straight lower edge. Decorative upper edge rounded towards the lower edge. Steel ferrule has worn floral pattern and an extension to which the blade is attached. Ribbed ivory handle, round in section. On top of handle a decorated steel mount and finial. Blade folds towards the handle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cleaver, 16th century.
16th century. ivory, steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-145.
